short_description: chubbsafes india is a security guard & patrol services company based in thane, india.
long_description: since 1835, chubbsafes is trusted the world over for safes, strong rooms and vault doors, with a focus on innovation. chubbsafes solutions are well-known and appreciated for their unique combination of robustness, reliability and modern designs. they associate experience in security with technological innovation to create trustworthy products for maximum protection against burglary, fire and explosives. they are rigorously tested by international and independent accreditation bodies to guarantee the best protection available. the chubbsafes' customer base is diverse ranging from householders, small commercial shops, large retail environments, jewelleries to the largest financial institutions and high-risk sites. chubbsafes safe storage solutions comprise a wide range of safes, vaults, vault doors and cabinets. these products are sold and used all over the world, with a particularly strong position in europe, africa and asia. the chubbsafes brand is licensed to gunnebo which is a global provider of security products specialising in safe storage, entrance control, cash management and integrated security.
business_tags: security products | vault doors | cash management | fire protection | storage solutions | security & investigations | government administration | safe & vault
